| HistoryText             = After the [[Living Tribunal (Multiverse)|Living Tribunal]]'s decree that the [[Infinity Gauntlet]] could no longer be used in conjunction, [[Adam Warlock (Earth-616)|Warlock]] decided to separate the gems among a set of custodians.{{r|Warlock and the Infinity Watch Vol 1 1}}

Warlock kept the [[Soul Stone|Soul Gem]], gave the [[Time Stone|Time Gem]] to [[Gamora Zen Whoberi Ben Titan (Earth-7528)|Gamora]], the [[Space Stone|Space Gem]] to [[Pip Gofern (Earth-616)|Pip the Troll]], the [[Power Stone|Power Gem]] to [[Arthur Douglas (Earth-616)|Drax]] and the [[Mind Stone|Mind Gem]] to [[Heather Douglas (Earth-616)|Moondragon]],{{r|Warlock and the Infinity Watch Vol 1 2}} He secretly also bestowed the [[Reality Stone|Reality Gem]] to [[Thanos (Earth-616)|Thanos]].{{r|Warlock Chronicles Vol 1 1}} The team was disbanded after the gems ended up in the [[Earth-93060|Ultraverse]].{{r|Warlock and the Infinity Watch Vol 1 42}}{{r|Rune/Silver Surfer Vol 1 1}}

Following the destruction and rebirth of the Infinity Stones, these relics of power became scattered across the universe. They eventually fell in the hands of these individuals: Warlock (the Soul Stone), [[Turk Barrett (Earth-616)|Turk Barrett]] (the Mind Stone), [[Natalia Romanova (Earth-616)|Black Widow]] (the Space Stone), [[Peter Quill (Earth-616)|Star-Lord]] (the Power Stone), [[Carol Danvers (Earth-616)|Captain Marvel]] (the Reality Stone) and [[Kl'rt (Earth-616)|Super-Skrull]] (the Time Stone). After [[Stephen Strange (Earth-616)|Doctor Strange]] stole the Time Stone from the Super-Skrull, he contacted the other wielders of the Infinity Stones and requested parley to reassemble the Infinity Watch for the sake of the gem's protection.{{r|Infinity Countdown Vol 1 5}}

The Infinity Watch convened in [[Central Park]] on [[Earth]]. Their meeting was interrupted by the arrival of Gamora, who set out to collect the Infinity Stones as part of a plan to reunite with a fragment of herself that was trapped within the Soul Gem.{{r|Infinity Wars Vol 1 1}} In the middle of the ensuing fight, Doctor Strange convinced Turk Barrett to hand over the Mind Stone and walk away. After taking the Reality Stone from Captain Marvel, Gamora progessively got hold of the rest, murdering Warlock in the process.{{r|Infinity Wars Vol 1 2}}
